1131.content:
"Woah, I'm feeling really strange big brother." Setting down your imaginary tea to look at your sister you could tell something was off. She looked... taller. Not by much mind you, but definitely a few inches taller than you remembered her being. People don't just grow instantly like that though. Did she have a small growth spurt overnight and you're just now noticing?

"Am I just imagining it or do you look taller Kelsey?"

"Huh?! You think I really grew?" Kelsey responded, shocked.

"Yeah. You might have grown overnight. Here let's go and measure you." Quickly you rise up from your chair to grab the tape measure on the other side of the kitchen. Meanwhile Kelsey runs up to the nearby wall and straighten ups her posture in anticipation. Measuring her head from toe you quickly find out that your suspicions are correct. 4'8". That's a complete 4 inches more than she was yesterday. She must of had a hell of a growth spurt last night. Unless something else was causing her to grow this fast. It couldn't have been that cookie, could it? "Wow Kelsey, you're just over 4'8", you're growing like a weed these days."

"Oh my gosh, really!" Kelsey yelled in excitement, "That's awesome! If this keeps up I might be the tallest girl in my class next year." You can't help but feel happy for her but you also can't seem to shake a weird feeling deep inside your gut. Was it... worry? If that cookie did in fact cause her to grow who is it to say it couldn't make her grow even more later on? You try to brush off the thought. It'll probably leave her system in the next day or two and even if she did grow some more she probably wouldn't get too tall, right? And that is assuming the cookie made her grow in the first place, she probably just grew overnight. Probably.

"How about we go ahead and finish our game, the tea is probably getting cold."

"Oh! You're right big bro, let's go play." Both of you return to the table and continue playing. Just seeing how happy she has become playing with you, you decide to play with her a bit longer than you usually did. After over three hours of tea parties, movies, and general games like tag or hide and seek, the two of you decide to call it quits and head back inside the real house. Although you're wide awake your sister on the other hand decides to rest a little bit and takes a nap. Meanwhile you go back to watching TV on the couch, already putting your suspicions on your sister's sudden growth in the back of your mind as you go and watch your favorite shows.

Is there anything different about Kelsey when she wakes up?

11312.content:
"Big brother! Big bro! It happened again!" It had been over two hours after Kelsey went to sleep when you heard her yelling while running down the hall. When she walked into the living room you were completely blown away at what you saw. She was taller yet again! She was no doubt at least 5' tall. Her dress, which once fit snugly on her dainty 4'4" frame, was now being stretched to capacity. What used to go down to below her knees now has a hard time going beyond the middle of her thighs. Normally you'd expect someone to be shocked and/or scared after growing 4 or so something inches in the span of only two hours but Kelsey looked ecstatic, even in her undersized and uncomfortable dress. "I had another growth spurt big bro! I must be in puberty or something. I heard you grow a lot during puberty but I never knew I would grow this much! This is so cool, don't you think so big brother?"

You took a pause, there was a lot to take in. It seems as if your suspicions about the cookie were correct, though on the bright side it also appears that Kelsey is oblivious to the true reason for her growth spurts. Puberty might just be the excuse you need if she does end up growing again. All you can hope for at this point is that the cookie's effects wear off soon. Who knows maybe they already have? "I... think that makes sense. You are nearing the age where you would normally hit puberty, maybe you just hit it a bit earlier than usual. I think it's cool. Cool. Very... very cool."

"Awesome! I'll definitely be the tallest in my class next year if that's the case. Do you think I'll grow again big brother?"

"I think it's possible, but let's not think about that now. How about we go measure you again?" Although you're worried on how big she might or might not get, it's at least a good thing that she want to grow. Well, a good thing for right now. Both of you end up going back outside into the playhouse so you could measure Kelsey. On the way though you notice how strange Kelsey proportions seem to be. It seems as if she isn't just getting taller but bigger all over as she appears to keep the same proportions she had when she was only 4'4". Just further proof for you that all this growth seems to be that cookie's fault. Eventually you take Kelsey measurements and aren't in the slightest bit surprised. "Looks like your around 5'1" now Kelsey."

"Eeeeck!' Kelsey couldn't help but flail around in happiness. "I can't wait till my next growth spurt. I wonder if I'll be as tall as you one day."

"Maybe... anyways, don't you think we should do something about your clothes? That dress looks awfully small on you." Your parents left you a large deposit of money before they left so the two of you could buy necessities. You don't really want to dig into that money so soon but it doesn't look like your going to have a choice soon enough.

"Is there something wrong with my dress big bro? I think it fits fine. Plus it's so cute! How about we think about clothes when I grow again." Before you could even say something in response Kelsey begins to wander off. You could just tell that this summer was going to be crazy. After a minute of standing around thinking to yourself, you decide to head to your room, it has been a long day already and it was only 4:30.

What happens next?

You were quite surprised with the ease your parents up and left you in charge of your sister for three whole months to have an extended second honeymoon. You knew Kelsey was a handful and they offered to give pay for your whole freshman year of college for doing this, and never could find any other job for the summer to pay for tuition, but... still...

Before you could ponder on the ethics of your parents wanting to take a secluded three vacation from their daughter to help their marriage instead of just getting counseling like regular folks any further, Kelsey hears the familiar chime of...

"Ice cream truck!!"

Eh, what the hell. Been ages since you got something from one of these, and you wanted to start this three month sequester with your sister on a good note, not to mention you don't really see too many of them on the road anymore...

You head out to see only one or two other kids out there, your hot MILFy neighbor Sandra Maddox, a pixie-cut busty redhead in her mid-40's dressed in a t-shirt and denim skirt, the old cranky guy from across the street Paul Dressar, balding and well into his 80's, dressed in khaki slacks, powder blue dress shirt, and glasses, and your girlfriend was also there, Jenny Chang, a long-haired physically fit girl dolled up in jean shorts and a bikini top supporting her B-cup chest.

"What, no Firecracker? An ice cream truck without the Firecracker just seems un-American..." Paul grumbles. He orders something called a "Freshmint Freezer," though he isn't too pleased about it.

"Hey Keith (that's you), I think I found the fudge pops, but it looks like it has a weird name..." Jenny says to you. "All these things on the menu have odd names, but from the pictures and descriptions next to them, you can at least easily tell what flavor they are, and maybe what they're similar to." Jenny looks puzzled, then adds, "Why would you call fudge pops 'Pleasure Island Browns?'" She then proceeds to get a couple for herself, saying, "I'd stick around, but I'd better get these out of the heat. I still have to finish mowing my yard, and it's been brutal, so I plan to save one of them for later." Jenny then hurries on back home, freeing you and Kelsey to make your purchases.

- You get an ice cream sandwich called "Nya Nya Neapolitan," and Kelsey gets a pop called "Pink Cherry Cannon." (You experience a catgirl TG, while Kelsey gets older and is turned into a futa bimbo.)

- You get something similar to what Kelsey gets in the first idea - a pop called "Pink Cherry Mind Explosion." Meanwhile Kelsey gets a slushy called the "Amazing Applederry." (You become a regular bimbo, while Kelsey becomes a centaur.)

So, which one happens?

Kelsey was puzzled by the sudden fluttering from her stomach and looked at you with wide eyes. "I feel funny." Kelsey said while putting her hands to her head, you notice instantly that she is getting wider and taller very quickly. "Woah!" Kelsey cried as she saw herself in a tall mirror near her. Normally Kelsey was a fairly small framed girl, she wasn't tall or very wide and her figure had yet to show any signs of puberty. Her light-brown hair was frizzy and went past her shoulders. Her face was oval shaped with round high cheeks and full light pink lips. She had dark brown eyes and thin light brown eye-brows. Her shoulders were slender and she wore a light blue blouse with little white frills on her shoulder-high sleeves. Kelsey had a very flat stomach and her hips were fairly full and would be very thick when she got older. Kelsey wore a pair of dark-blue blue jeans with hearts on the back pockets, and a pair of light blue sandals. Her toes had pink nail polish as did her fingers. She had stubby arms and legs and stood 3'6. Her dark brown eyes scanned over the changing body she saw in the mirror.

Kelsey smiled as she saw her reflection rise up higher and higher. She could feel her clothes getting tight as you took a step back in disbelief. "I think its your turn now." Kelsey said gleefully and continued to fill more space. You guessed she was over 7 feet tall and could feel your heart rapidly beat with fear. Kelsey was getting very large and you could hear her clothes as she swelled. A button popped as the zipper of Kelsey's pants tore open. From where you sat you could see a light pink ribbon and a massive white area you realized was Kelsey's underwear. Kelsey had to be over 9 feet tall and she was looking down at you grinning. You look up at her and roll the dice. You roll a three and a four. Your piece moves seven spaces and you say to Kelsey, "Ok now it is your turn to roll." with audible panic in your voice. You feel your heart sink as Kelsey playfully shakes her head no. "I don't wanna. I like growing and want to get bigger and bigger!" She squeals as her head hits the ceiling of the living room. Kelsey's arms and back tore holes in her blouse that spread till the garment was in tatters. Her blue jeans tore down the sides and Kelsey was standing in a pair of white frilly panties with a pink ribbon in top-middle.

You could hear the ceiling breaking as Kelsey's shoulders and back pressed into it. She was starting to laugh and the sound was adding to your fear. Kelsey was easily over 13 feet tall and you could see her one piece of clothing seemed to be growing with her though very tightly pressed against her. You could see Kelsey's torso and legs but the top of her body was through the hole she had made. You wondered how big she would end up being and shuddered as you heard the roof creaking. Her body was surging up and her whole form was growing thicker as she took up more and more area. You could see Kelsey wiggle her enormous toes, and worried as she was very clearly excited.

Without warning Kelsey ducked back down through the hole her head had made. You cough as debris and dust fog the air. Kelsey's massive head is inches from your face and you see her brown eyes are sparkling with delight. "I wanna play a new game." Kelsey said while smiling widely. "It is still your turn and you have to roll." You plead, terrified of your massive growing sister.

"I will roll when I feel like it. I wanna play tag, and I get to be it." Kelsey commanded as her smile grew wider, she continued to grow all over. She had to be over 20 feet tall though you had no means of measuring and she was showing no sign of slowing. You run for the front door and bolt for your car. Kelsey is trapped inside at the moment but you know that will not be for long. You start the car and feel your heart drop into your stomach. You look in the rear-view mirror to see Kelsey's head burst through the roof of your house. She had to be over 26 feet tall and she stood looking down at you in your car. You put the car in drive and start going as fast as you can. Kelsey is just standing and watching you as she continues to grow.

You see in the rear view mirror that she is watching your car while just standing still, you can guess that is she giving you time to run as part of the chase. Kelsey looks taller than most of the houses and you guess she is over 40 feet tall. You have no idea how to stop her growing, and if that card was right only the dice in the ruined house would work. You start to hyperventilate as you realize your nine year old sister may keep on growing with out end. You have to get to the house and find the dice but how are you going to do that at this rate? You think to yourself while trying to calm down, panic was causing your vision to blur and you felt dizzy as you saw Kelsey began to move.

She was expanding all over and very slowly walking towards you. You had driven as quickly as you could but she was closing the distance with each step. "I'm getting closer!" Kelsey boomed from above your head. You were shocked by how much distance she was covering in each step and had no idea how to escape. Kelsey was very close to you and bent over. You felt helpless as your car was lifted up into the air. Kelsey was holding the sides of the car with her hands and looked into the wind-shield. "You look like a dolly." Kelsey stated, her face was lit with joy and you wondered what she would do now that she had won.

Kelsey had drawn a massive crowd of people who were trying to acclimate to the scene. She was holding you several dozen feet in the air and you could feel her body was growing higher. Suddenly you felt a shifting in the car as Kelsey fell back. She had been standing up but carelessly fell onto her back crushing a few people in the process. She was still holding your car and you felt sick from the shaking. She was looking up into your car from on her back and didn't seem to care that the world was shrinking around her expanding self. "Kelsey I think you just crushed someone." You inform the blissful child. Kelsey casually shrugs her shoulders and then sets your car on her chest. You are amazed that she has grown so large and can see her torso filled most of your view.

You try to drive and hear Kelsey giggle as your tires dig into her skin. "That tickles!" Kelsey cackled and playfully grabbed the sides of the car. You can feel her fingers dig into the car, and she caused massive dents along the sides. You worry that she might crush you inside the car as her fingers continue to push the car into itself. "Kelsey! Stop!" You yell and feel relieved as she did so. Kelsey was slowly becoming taller than the buildings around her and everyone was starting to look smaller than bugs. At this point...
154232111.title: Flee your growing sister

You wanted your siblings size to retire but now the consequences will be most dire your sister shall continue to rise into the sky higher than any spire till size is no longer her desire and you liar are forced to retire. The the tribe has spoken you're voted off the island disqualified post haste.
154232111121.title: Try to cheat

1543.content:
Well... your parents left you with your bratty sister for three months... What kind of parents would do just th...

"Hey, my show's on!! Turn it!!" Kelsey declares.

"You REALLY got to watch that show every day? I don't even like the show and I know the season's over; no more new episodes until next season."

"But it's my FAVORITE show..." she sulks.

Fine. You decide to give her this. You realize if you start this sequester together fighting, it'll set the tone for thee next three months. Then, it came on. That theme song makes you cringe every time you hear it. Why?!

You don't really pay attention to the show, but you've seen Kelsey watch it enough that from the audio you know it's that one where the shy horse gets advice from that Randy Savage sounding minotaur on toughening up. Kelsey really liked that shy horse for some reason, despite the fact she acts more like a mix of the rainbow one and the dumb pink bimbo party horse.

"I don't understand why you like that 'Flutter Butter.' I mean, they're right, she lets everyone walk all over her, she's scared of her own shadow, and even if she DOES act tough, she seems to forget how to do that net time."

"It's 'Fluttershy,' and she's awesome and sweet and kind." Kelsey retorted. "Yeah, she might be a little scared of things, but not all of us can be tough, not... not all the time."

"Still think she's lame." you tell her. "Show's lame too. Their world's so candy coated and nice. Trust me, in the real world, she'd be chewed up and spit out by now."

About then, a voice says, "So much strife in this world, I see. What it needs is more friendship to be free." Just then rays of light burst out of the television, hitting both Kelsey and you...

What is the light going to do?

         - A yellow strikes you and a red light hits Kelsey, causing you to slowly become Fluttershy, and Kelsey Big Mac...
         - A purple light hits you while a rainbow light hits Kelsey, causing you to slowly become Rarity as she becomes Rainbow Dash...
         - A grey light hits you as a powder blue one goes for Kelsey, turning the two of you into Octavia and Vinyl, respectively...
1543.title: I like ponies!!

15431.content: How does the change play out?
15431.title: Fluttershy & Big Mac...

154312.content:
How does the change play out?

- You both change into the "Equestria Girls" versions of the characters, including the clothes and skin color...
- You both become "humanized ponies," i.e. mostly human, but with minor secondary pony body parts like ears, wings, horns, and for the girls, tails.

155332221.content:
You are babysitting your little 9 year old
sister Kelsey while your mom is doing work stuff.


Your sister is in the backyard playing dolls when
Aliens make a surprise visit.
Kelsey offered them team and lemonade.
They leave her a strange ray device in return
and snicker.


You call her inside.
You notice the device.
It’s a strange looking gun with writing on it.


You take it from her.

“Hey give that back Kevin”

“I’m just looking at it”

Suddenly a red beam shoots out and zaps
Kelsey.

“Oops I’m sorry”


He stops firing it oblivious that
1 of the lights on the side goes out.

“Kevin I feel strange”


Suddenly your eyes go wide.
Kelsey looked...Shorter..
Wait she didn’t just look it
She was actually shrinking before your eyes.

“Kevin help I feel weird and I don’t like
this feeling! What’s happening to me”

Kelsey was soon half her normal size and still
shrinking.
Another problem becomes clear.
Kelsey’s favorite dress and other clothes were
not shrinking with her.

Her underwear soon slip off.
Minutes later there’s a heap of clothes
but it seems your sister is gone.

You start to panic when you noticed her pink
panties moving around.
Suddenly your literally little sister pops out.

She’s so small now.

She climbs out.

“What happened to me? Everything is so big!
And brr I’m cold”

Suddenly she hears a loud sound.
You tower over her.
You reach down and carefully pick up her
Kelsey is freakin out.


You are in shock and awe.
She’s small enough to wrap your
thumb and index finger around her waist like
you’re doing now.
155332221.title: Kelsey and the aliens gift... sort of ( reserved )

choices: Whoops Kelsey grows to 8 feet tall
Whoops Kelsey grows to 16 feet tall
Oh no Kelsey grows to 80 feet tall
Fee Fi Fo Fum Fun Kelsey grows to 180 feet tall
1553322211.content:
It had taken awhile but you had managed to
calm down the shrunken Kelsey.


Kelsey actually started to like being shrunken for
a bit save the extra sensitivity to the chill of the floor.
She wanted to explore and have fun at this size.


Unfortunately the fun would be short lived.
Their mother was coming home early.


She was a pretty good mom and all but
Kevin’s only complaints were she doted a lot
on Kelsey and tried to project onto her.


There was the time she’d tried to get Kelsey
into pageants and 2 contests in Kelsey said
she no longer wanted to.
Mom freaked!


Then she tried the Girl Scouts but
Kelsey refused.
Then there was rhythmic gymnastics.
Again Kelsey hated it.


Sure Kelsey could be girly but just not
as girly as Mom apparently wanted.
It was almost as tho mom were trying to live
vicariously thru Kelsey.


The front door opened.
“Kids I’m home”


Their mother came in.
“Hi Kevin, where’s your sister? I found the cutest dress!”


You gulped.
“What’s wrong you look pale”

“And what’s this thing on the counter”
She picked it up firing a blast out the window.
Fortunately all she’d done was shrink a squirrel.
She noticed the blast though.

“Good heavens this thing looks dangerous!
You had this around the House with your sister here?
Are you insane? Now where’s your sister”


“Down here mom” she squeaked.


“Oh my dear heavens Kelsey what has
Kevin done to you?”

“I kind of accidentally shrank her with that device
in your hands”


“Oh my gosh you stupid bastard.
What have you done to my poor angel?
We need to fix her. Please tell me there’s
a way to do it.”


She inspects the device. Neither of you noticed
after her misfire that 2 out of 3 lights were out.
She soon thinks she’s found the answer and adjusted
a knob.

“Aha most of the symbols are strange but
you had near the minus symbol so
I figure the +/+/X marks should fix your sister”


“Mom it’s ok I like be small for now
I want to explore and play a bit”


“Now see here young lady!”

Uh oh here it comes mom was about to go
ballIistic.


“You may have said no to pageants,
to Girl Scouts, to rhythmic gymnastics and
a few other things but this is where I draw the line
young lady!

1st Off you’re in danger at that size!
2nd no daughter of mine is going to runaround
stark naked!
3rd we have no clothes that will fit you in that state!
4th we have no idea how long the battery on
this whatever it is will last”


By this point she was getting beyond anger and
more panicked.

“Besides sweetie if you stay tiny
how are you going to ever get married,
have kids and make me a proud grandma.
It’s not like your brother has girls lining up for him.
I don’t wanna see your future flushed down the toile”


You tried to ignore the jab at you.

Kelsey relented.
“O-ok mom”

She stood still while mom took aim.
She fired the device. This time a different color
and stronger beam than ever before struck
Kelsey.
Mom kept firing til the device beeped.
The last red light flashed then it stopped.



Suddenly the device smoked and sparked.
Mom dropped it. You all watch as it suddenly
goes poof turning itself into a pile of ashes.


You and mom then noticed Kelsey.

“I-I feel strange again big brother”


It started to work. Kelsey was enlarging this time
her proportions remaining the same.
